# timeOffset

**Instance Property**

Specifies an additional time offset in active local time.

## Declaration

```swift
var timeOffset: CFTimeInterval { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to 0. .

## Animation Start Time

- **beginTime**: Specifies the begin time of the receiver in relation to its parent object, if applicable.
